#All features of gwtphp-derpc

= Features=

 * all basic types (int, String, byte, char...) are transformed in native php types 
 * all object basic types (Integer, Byte, Char...) are transformed in native php types. You can create one of these type by :
{{{ 
new Integer($value); 
}}}
 * Array is supported. Use php array.
 * enums are supported. Enum types are translated in php file with a class with the enum name. Use the notation Color::RED to access the member RED of the enum Color (Color.RED). 
 * enclosing types are supported. 
 * List, Set and Map are supported
